content: methuselah designs www leslierothknits com home again cowl by leslie roth sizes small medium large finished measurements circumference 18 23 27 5 height 5 5 10 10 materials mc malabrigo dos tierras 50% merino wool 3 5oz/100g 210yds/193m 1 hank whale s road #247 cc malabrigo dos tierras 50%merino wool/50% baby alpaca 3 5oz/100g 210yds/193m 1 hank gris #212 size 4 3 5 mm 16 16 24 circular needle size 6 4 mm 16 16 24 circular needle 1 stitch marker gauge 21 stitches & 26 rounds = 4 inches in color work pattern stitch please check gauge and adjust needle size as needed abbreviations cc contrast color k knit mc main color p purl notes the cowl is worked in the round the small size is meant to be worn close to the neck please note it is important to use a stretchy cast-on and bind-off for the smallest size to make sure it fits over the head please read the chart from right to left beginning in the bottom right hand corner the color work pattern is a 24 stitch repeat meaning that the cowl can be altered in size by changing the total number of stitches in multiples of twenty-four if making it larger please remember to purchase an adequate amount of yarn to complete the project please note that two rib stitch patterns are provided for the edging please choose one before beginning the project the large light colored cowl was knit with finnsheep yarn in natural white and dyed indigo the yarn can be purchased when available at www boondogglefarm com it s amazing yarn…soft and bouncy all rights to this design/pattern belong to the designer/author and may not be used without permission stitch patterns 1 x 1 rib multiple of 2 stitches round 1 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round repeat round 1 to form pattern or 2 x 2 rib multiple of 4 stitches round 1 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end of round repeat round 1 to form pattern instructions with mc and smaller needle cast on 96 120 144 stitches place a marker at the beginning of the round and join without twisting to knit in the round work 8 rounds of 1 x 1 rib or 2 x 2 rib change to larger needle knit one round add cc when needed and work the chart one two two times for 23 46 46 rounds cut cc and with mc knit two rounds change to smaller needle continue using mc and work 8 rounds of 1 x 1 rib or 2 x 2 rib bind off all stitches finishing weave in all ends block lightly as desired all rights to this design/pattern belong to the designer/author and may not be used without permission
